titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Robert Louis Laing McCormick Papers
titlestmt.author: compiled by William E. Brown, Jr.

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Saturday December 8, 2018 at 08:59

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: Correspondence, memoranda, press releases, printed matter, and reports pertaining to the Citizens Committee for the Hoover Report (1948-1958), postwar Germany, the 1968 election, the Veterans Administration, and environmental policies. The papers also contain correspondence, reports and printed matter of Charles E. Smith (1948-1957) and correspondence, memoranda, reports etc. on the American Tariff League, Inc. (1955-1959) and the Trade Relations Council of the United States (1959-1963).

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Robert Louis Laing McCormick Papers (MS 338). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Gift of Robert L.L. McCormick, 1965, and Dorothy McCormick, 1983.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged in four series and one addition: I. Citizens Committee for the Hoover Report. II. Trade Relations Council Files. III. Trade Files. IV. Publications.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Government official; A.B., Yale 1940; held various positions with the government throughout WW II; assistant to the chairman of the 1st Hoover Commission, 1947-1949; director of research for the Citizens Committee for Hoover Report, 1949-1954, research consultant, 1954-1961; consultant 2nd Hoover Commission, 1953-1955; vice president of Coates & McCormick, Inc., 1952-1956; president of McCormick Associates, Inc., 1957-1965; director of research for Republican National Committee, 1965-1969.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, memoranda, press releases, printed matter, and reports pertaining to the Citizens Committee for the Hoover Report (1948-1958), postwar Germany, the 1968 election, the Veterans Administration, and environmental policies. The papers also contain correspondence, reports and printed matter of Charles E. Smith (1948-1957) and correspondence, memoranda, reports etc. on the American Tariff League, Inc. (1955-1959) and the Trade Relations Council of the United States (1959-1963).

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright status for collection materials is unknown. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.
